TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RequestNavigateEventHandler(object sender, RequestNavigateEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed RequestNavigateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The object where the event handler is attached.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink.RequestNavigate"> routed event of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> class.
